about.summary: Various R programming tools for plotting data, including: - calculating and plotting locally smoothed summary function as ('bandplot', 'wapply'), - enhanced versions of standard plots ('barplot2', 'boxplot2', 'heatmap.2', 'smartlegend'), - manipulating colors ('col2hex', 'colorpanel', 'redgreen', 'greenred', 'bluered', 'redblue', 'rich.colors'), - calculating and plotting two-dimensional data summaries ('ci2d', 'hist2d'), - enhanced regression diagnostic plots ('lmplot2', 'residplot'), - formula-enabled interface to 'stats::lowess' function ('lowess'), - displaying textual data in plots ('textplot', 'sinkplot'), - plotting a matrix where each cell contains a dot whose size reflects the relative magnitude of the elements ('balloonplot'), - plotting "Venn" diagrams ('venn'), - displaying Open-Office style plots ('ooplot'), - plotting multiple data on same region, with separate axes ('overplot'), - plotting means and confidence intervals ('plotCI', 'plotmeans'), - spacing points in an x-y plot so they don't overlap ('space').

name: r-gplots
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.0.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gplots
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: gplots_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/gplots_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/gplots/gplots_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d776d3ee9e284085f6ec1b7717afcd5c4addad60d2f1f4f220cda788c8ac4643

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth
    - r-catools
    - r-gdata
    - r-gtools
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-kernsmooth
    - r-catools
    - r-gdata
    - r-gtools

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('gplots')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('gplots')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=gplots
  license: GPL-2
  summary: "Various R programming tools for plotting data, including: - calculating and plotting locally smoothed summary function as ('bandplot', 'wapply'), - enhanced\
    \ versions of standard plots ('barplot2', 'boxplot2', 'heatmap.2', 'smartlegend'), - manipulating colors ('col2hex', 'colorpanel', 'redgreen', 'greenred', 'bluered',\
    \ 'redblue', 'rich.colors'), - calculating and plotting two-dimensional data summaries ('ci2d', 'hist2d'), - enhanced regression diagnostic plots ('lmplot2',\
    \ 'residplot'), - formula-enabled interface to 'stats::lowess' function ('lowess'), - displaying textual data in plots ('textplot', 'sinkplot'), - plotting a\
    \ matrix where each cell contains a dot whose size reflects the relative magnitude of the elements ('balloonplot'), - plotting \"Venn\" diagrams ('venn'), - displaying\
    \ Open-Office style plots ('ooplot'), - plotting multiple data on same region, with separate axes ('overplot'), - plotting means and confidence intervals ('plotCI',\
    \ 'plotmeans'), - spacing points in an x-y plot so they don't overlap ('space')."
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
